text: Hiɓe lamdo maa fii rewɓe ɓen, maaku : "Alla no saggitude on fii ɓen [rewɓe], e kon ko jaŋngetee e dow mooɗon ka Deftere fii ɓen rewɓe wonduɓe, ɓen ɓe on jonnataa kon ko ɓe farlanaaa, hiɗon rerɗa fii resugol ɓe, e ɓen lo'inaaɓe immorde ka fayɓe, e nde daraŋtoɗon wonduɓe ɓen nunɗal.
